Title: Relates to permitting, rather than requiring default judgments in cases of failure to answer
Summary: Permits, rather than requires, the filing of a default judgment in cases where a person fails to answer a traffic infraction after having been given notice by first class mail that such default judgment may be entered for failure to appear.
LawCode: Amd ยง1806-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to default judgments in cases of failure to answer
